name: Breathe (itch) (gaet)
description:
This is a short game made for Godot Wild Jam 41 on the theme 'Ocean'. I didn't have a lot of time for this one so I thought I would focus on doing things I had not done before. This time, I played around with character animation and boids...

I noticed some lags in the web version sometimes. As you can imagine, there were exactly zero optimization or code cleanup ;)
